DOC.HEADLINE: WEEKEND TV ; KCET OFFERS A HEALTHY DIET OF SHOWS
DOC.TEXT: As a part of pledge drive this weekend , KCET-TV Channel 28 offers three shows aimed at helping viewers get and stay healthy . First up at 1:30 p.m. today is " Fit or Fat for the ' 90s With Covert Bailey , " with diet and exercise tips , followed at 3:15 p.m. by " Heart to Heart : The Truth About Heart_Disease , " which features information on how to prevent , recognize , treat and cope_with heart ailments . Then at 4:30 today comes " Art Linkletter on Positive Aging , " in which the 81-year-old former TV host reveals how to age with optimism and dignity and how to avoid scam artists . N.F. MENDOZA
